tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_licenses (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    software_name VARCHAR(255),
    license_key VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    is_compliant BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE software_licenses (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    software_name VARCHAR(255),
    license_type VARCHAR(50),
    license_key VARCHAR(100),
    issue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    company_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    license_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    expiry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (license_id) REFERENCES software_licenses(license_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    billing_address VARCHAR(255),
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    expiry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE license_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    license_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_email VARCHAR(255),
    user_role VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (license_id) REFERENCES software_licenses(license_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    log_description TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES license_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE license_audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    license_id INT,
    audit_result VARCHAR(50),
    audit_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (license_id) REFERENCES software_licenses(license_id)
);
